alert.note: Alert for Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 2:59AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Tripp County through 430 AM CDT... At 359 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Witten, or 15 miles northwest of Winner, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ideal around 405 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
